name: cross-env-test
description: Test environment variables across operating system environments

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run rollup && npm run compile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:coverage && rimraf ./dist && rimraf ./ts && rimraf ./tmp
scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run premocha && npm run lint
scripts.test: cross-env CROSS_ENV_TEST_FLAG_NS=test istanbul cover _mocha -- -R spec ts/**/*.js
scripts.posttest: npm run remap-istanbul && npm run clean:coverage && npm run cover
scripts.pretest:w: npm run clean && npm run tsc
scripts.test:w: concurrently "cross-env CROSS_ENV_TEST_FLAG_NS=test npm run mocha:w" "npm run tsc:w"

author: Rangle.io
